content: this is a summary of a legal text explaining the progress of a court case that started in 2016 and lasted for 6 years the court made its final ruling on april 22 2022 the case involves two parties referred to as germans and e who are coowners of a property consisting of land and a building the court ruled that the property should be sold at auction due to technical problems and illegal works on the land the courtappointed expert assessed the value of the property and determined the amounts due to each party the court also mentioned the possibility of a cash adjustment the court decided that the costs of the litigation should be shared equally by both parties the court awarded joint ownership of the property to the parties with one owing €218100 and the other owing €163625 the court also ordered the parties to fully compensate each other for the costs of the litigation and share the costs of a separate decree record the ruling was made by a sole judge on april 11 2022
